item.title: Deceleration
item.description:
misdirection
is a tool
in my parental toolbox
that’s getting a lot of use

1 minute read

item.title: Bedtime
item.description:
It's bedtime
because I say it is
and because routine
and predictability
are important components
of stable home life
for a child of three

1 minute read
